name: stoichiometric
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the relationship between the quantities of substances involved in a chemical reaction and the substances that are produced as a result of that chemical reaction: It is possible to predict the effect of changing concentration by referring to the stoichiometric equation for the reaction. These salts were added in sufficient quantities to obtain the same stoichiometric balance as sea water.
More examplesFewer examplesStoichiometric equations can be used to calculate the volumes of the products of a reaction.There is a region where the fuel to oxidizer ratio is sufficiently close to the stoichiometric ratio for combustion to occur.One method is based on the stoichiometric calculation of the reactive iron.
